Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: The selected 5% cashback merchants are valid till 31 December 2015, unless otherwise stated.

To enjoy the 5% cashback at designated merchants on your Maybank Family & Friends Platinum MasterCard, a min spend amount of S$500 per calendar month is required Otherwise, the 0.3% cashback will apply.
The maximum cashback that a Maybank Family & Friends Platinum MasterCard Cardmember can receive is S$600, calculated based on posted transactions in a calendar year.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% cash rebates with min. spend of S$500 at selected merchant outlets such as NTUC, Cold Storage, Guardian and POPULAR Bookstores
Earn 0.3% cash rebates on all other purchases or if spending is below S$500

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% cash rebates with min. spend of S$500 at KFC Delivery, McDonald's Delivery and Pizza Hut Delivery
Earn 0.3% cash rebates on all other purchases or if spending is below S$500

Details.Name: sc_entertainment_details
Details.Feature: Earn 0.3% cash rebates on all purchases

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% cash rebates with min. spend of S$500 at NTUC, Cold Storage and Unity
Earn 0.3% cash rebates on all other purchases or if spending is below S$500

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% cash rebates with min. spend of S$500 at leading petrol stations in Malaysia (BHPetrol, Caltex, Petron, Petronas and Shell)
Earn 0.3% cash rebates on all other purchases or if spending is below S$500

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: Enjoy 5% cash rebates with min. spend of S$500 at FOX Kids & Baby, Mothercare, Toys "R" Us, Yamaha Music, Watsons, Guardian and POPULAR Bookstores
Earn 0.3% cash rebates on all other purchases or if spending is below S$500
